programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1948
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep366
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: During the early years of the Republic era, in the North-East region of China, the people are suffering from the power struggle among the local Warlords, bandits, and Japanese invaders. Warlord Lam (Sammo Hung), is not a leader of great vision, but stands firm in his own beliefs. The only paradise within the region is 'Lucky Town', the one place where no one dared to attack as it was protected by the seven kung fu masters who have resided there. When young patriots, Yan Fang (Rose Chan) who disguised herself as a man, and Howard Luo (Dennis To), infiltrate Tiger's Den at night trying to steal the code book fail in their mission and tries to run, only Yan survives and is rescued by Cheryl. Mistaking Yan as a man, Cheryl falls for Yan. She then brings Yan to Lucky Town and begs the Seven Masters to cure Yan. Cheryl and the Seven Masters are then told of the secret plan by the Japanese, and together, they resolve to fight against Tiger Den and save Warlord Lam.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor (The Chinese Boxer) and action choreographer (Jackie Chan's Drunken Master), the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan (Once Upon A Time In China) and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li (Snake In The Eagle's Shadow) everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend’s grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous “Finger of Doom”, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Panchaksharam
programme.desc: Five friends get their hands on an ancient evil book, which predicts the reader's future. However, they must overcome all the challenges and change their fate before it gets too late.

programme.title: Super Police (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: A cop wants to eradicate all the criminals and make the country a better place to live. Although he faces many obstacles in his path of righteousness, he does not give up.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: A1 Express
programme.desc: A former player finds a renewed sense of purpose when he returns to the hockey field.

programme.title: Sindhubadh
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, falls in love with Venba and marries her before she goes to Malaysia. However, everything turns upside down when her father sells her for the skin trade.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Is a ghost haunting Kiran's ancestral property? Or is it a conman's master moves?

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Republic
programme.desc: An IIT gold medalist gets pulled into the Indian Administrative Services, where he confronts the newly elected political establishment.

programme.title: Brother'S Day
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Asura Guru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: K.G.F Chapter 2
programme.desc: Rocky takes control of the Kolar Gold Fields and his newfound power makes the government as well as his enemies jittery. However, he still has to confront Ramika, Adheera and Inayat.

programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Living Corpse
programme.desc: A woman’s corpse is found and sent for an autopsy. But before the procedure can begin, the woman “resurrects”! Alexandra, the forensic pathologist, secretly lodges with her while she tracks down the attacker. But before long, a second corpse appears.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Hermaphrodite
programme.desc: At the bottom of a cliff near Bordeaux, a corpse – composed of the bust of a white woman sewn to the legs of a black man – is found. Detectives Alex and Antoine know that the killer is making a sick statement but they struggle to decipher his motive.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: The Wedding Misplanner
programme.desc: Two in-laws have clashing ideas on the best wedding arrangement for their engaged children. Claudia, the groom’s mother, wants a small intimate affair while Herb, the bride’s father, wants a pompous ceremony. Peace is shattered, and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: The Wallet
programme.desc: A story of a hardworking young man who struggles to provide for the needs of his younger sibling and how the younger sibling shows his gratitude with a gift.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson sisters from a kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Halo Ep3
programme.desc: Emergence - John meets his new partner, and he discovers secrets inside his own memory. Kwan wants to return to Madrigal to continue her people’s fight for independence, but Soren has other plans for her.

programme.title: Halo Ep4
programme.desc: Homecoming - Guided by his visions, John takes Halsey and Cortana back to where it all began, looking for answers from his past. With Soren along for protection, Kwan goes in search of an army.

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep1
programme.desc: You Better Run - A Handball champion and a Track star are just two of the competitors in the Tag Arena. They face 5 grueling courses while being hunted down by the most menacing athletes. And there’s just one rule: Don’t. Get. Caught!

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep2
programme.desc: Real Men Do Cry - Tonight, a teacher, a prankster, and a NFL hopeful are 3 of the competitors to go up against the world’s most intimidating Taggers. They must run for their lives and obey one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught!

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep3
programme.desc: Girls Just Wanna Run - It’s age versus experience as 18-year-old student, a police officer, and a parkour professional try and outrun the pro Taggers. The battle requires nerves of steel and there’s only one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scarface Spirit / War-House Haunting / Winged Demon - EMT Rob is called to a serious car crash. Officer Vicki and partner are called to investigate the sighting of a man breaking into a home. Paramedic Jackie is called to assist a man who appears to be in serious psychosis.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Heart Burn / Last Rites / Suicide Jumper - Paramedic Melissa gets a call for a woman in cardiac arrest. Officer James responds to a 911 call – a car has hit a child. Security Officer Max is summoned to a office building when a door breach alarm is activated.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Rest In Peace, Please / Psych Ward Spirit - The spirit of a dead soldier continues to haunt Paramedic Scott and his family. Security Officer Leah is called to an abandoned psych ward building after a 911 call that a man had been lurking around the premises.

programme.desc: See how the cheese met the peanut butter in this legendary sandwich snack; get the scoop on two-toned frozen fruit bars from Florida; 1.5 million blueberry dumplings are produced in just one shift; and it takes a mountain of super-food to make tantalizing kale chips.

programme.title: Blue Planet II S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Coasts - Coasts are the most changeable and challenging of ocean habitats, but along with great danger they also offer great riches.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S7 Ep12
programme.desc: Oregon - Ben meets a photographer living out his childhood dream. Dan Price gave up his job as a photographer to live the remotest of lifestyles in a meadow in Oregon, USA.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South - They say to know the top of the South Island is to know New Zealand. Its geographically diverse nature has forged a diverse people with a coastline laden with intriguing stories.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11

In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: North America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores North America - a land of change where pioneering animals make the most of surprising opportunities.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scotland - Robson visits the west coast of Scotland for some of the area's famous shellfish fishing.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep8
programme.desc: How did a team of engineers nicknamed the "extreme team" build a futuristic research station in the world's most extreme climate, and how do you made a 3.5 tonne concrete arch appear to levitate?

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Panama - In Panama, Robson fishes for yellowfin, oysters, dorado and peacock bass.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - How to Catch a Lizard Ep1
programme.desc: Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - An Island Home Ep2
programme.desc: Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Walking with a Pangolin Ep3
programme.desc: Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families Ep1
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Love Ep2
programme.desc: It’s not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider who’ll risk his life for love.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Indonesia: Islands of Fire Ep1
programme.desc: With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Primate Families Ep6
programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - A Life Among Trees Ep3
programme.desc: How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And what’s it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Fires of Don Goyo Ep2
programme.desc: Volcanic folklore is reflected in Mexican history. One of their ancient legends tells the story of the Aztec warrior Popocatépetl - a giant active volcano - who erupts to wake his sleeping princess Iztaccíhuatl, a neighbouring extinct ice capped volcano.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - Group Survivial Ep5
programme.desc: For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Snakes Ep1
programme.desc: The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much/Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep37
programme.desc: Cat Fish - When pirates force Puss to face his fear of water by walking the ship's plank, he is rescued by his ex-girlfriend and fish monster, Feejee the Mermaid.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep38
programme.desc: Parrot Booty - When Puss and the pirates find the treasure of San Luis Rey, they must find a way to escape the attack of Bonky the Parrot and his skeleton army.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep37
programme.desc: Family On The Edge - When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep38
programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Rupert And The Butterfly Collector - Rupert, Bill and Edward set off to look for butterflies in the wood. In particular they hope to see the rare Polka Dot Butterfly. On the way, they meet a Butterfly Collector who is also looking for the Polka Dot but - instead of just enjoying watching the butterfly - he wants to catch it in his net and keep it in a jar. The friends see it as their mission to protect the Polka Dot and let it fly free.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Stars - Rupert pedals his car to meet Bill and Ping Pong at the tree house where they plan to spend the night. On his way he meets Raggety who is very proud of the new lantern he has made from glowing bugs he found in the forest. Rupert invites him to sleep at the tree house but Raggety announces he is a big brave elf and wants to sleep by himself. At the tree house, Bill has a surprise for Rupert. Astra the Star Girl has come to Nutwood, but sadly she has not come to play. She dropped some new stars while she was hanging them in the sky. They have fallen down to Earth and she has followed them to Nutwood. She has to get them back in the sky before nightfall or they will miss their first moonlight and fade away forever. Ping Pong magics Rupert's car into a flying car to assist their search but there are lots of shiny things in Nutwood sending them on false trails. Evening approaches and time is running out. Meanwhile, Raggety prepares for his night alone, and discovers the glowing bugs in his lantern can talk.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi'S Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Gran Up - When Gran’s Harley gets impounded, Dennis thinks she’s lost her groove and given up on her thrill-seeking ways. In trying to help her, Dennis accidentally ages himself up into an Old Man Dennis, who teams up with Gran to prove you’re never too old to be a rebel.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Tech Specs - Dennis is in the frame for a crime he didn’t commit, and Mrs Creecher’s new super-powered Tech Specs mean she can suddenly see WAY too well: she teams up with Sergeant Slipper to track down “fugitive Dennis” who has to somehow evade the all-seeing Tech Specs so he can prove his innocence and reveal the true criminal.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep21
programme.desc: The Blade Of Marmora - Two paladins are led to the headquarters of a secret society

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep21
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Four - With all three elemental power gems in hand, Fearless Leader sets out to take over the world. But with every use of the gems, the world becomes more unstable, and they’re heading toward certain destruction

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep16
programme.desc: Battering Ram - When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste Of Crackridge / The Bird And The Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Harmful Horrors Of The Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game Of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise/Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep16
programme.desc: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pig'S Tail - Tip's new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rupert And The Photo Finish - RUPERT lends his TRIPOD to the TWINS to keep their camera steady. The TWINS surprise RAGGETY, who accidentally aims a spell at the CAMERA, which comes alive. Now they're playing camera tag! Except if you get flashed you end up stuck in a photo! After RAGGETY, PING PONG, MING, EDWARD and BILL are all trapped, RUPERT realises that if they all get zapped they won't be able to play again – or even get out of the photos. But RUPERT has a plan. The TWINS act as bait so he can outsmart the CAMERA with its own reflection. The CAMERA takes a photo of itself, which releases everyone, and RAGGETY gets everything back to normal with a final spell.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rupert Lights The Way - When the Rocky Bay lighthouse stops working Rupert and friends try to help. But what can create enough light to warn the ships away from the rocks? When he sees Ming snapping at a firefly, Rupert gets an idea....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.desc: Compilation Special #2 Baby Shark's Big Show: Get Your Game On - Baby & William are putting on a game show and you can play along!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep307

programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington And The Meteor Shower - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day - Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Super Baby! - When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep514
programme.desc: The Mighty, Untidy Titans! - When some Untidy Titans (played by Guppies) start messing up Zooli, Nonny, and Oona's goat farm, the goat herders must journey to the Titan's cloud realm to ask them to tidy up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: From One Pit to Another - The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian / Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower / Moontaker - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Captain Steel - Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons - Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Genie in a Bubble! - When Nonny, Gil and Zooli conjure a genie, she agrees to grant whoever brings her the most precious gift a wish. They think it might be a precious gem, but turns out it's friendship!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep22

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep16
programme.desc: Treasure - Dee encourages a friend to say 'treasure' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today, we find lots of different treasure - gold treasure, royal treasure, sunken treasure, jungle treasure and even yummy treat treasure!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Song of the Stars - Small finds a strange object in space that turns out to have surprising musical talents.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep21

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Grow With the Flow - When some flowers pop-up near Tinpo HQ, there are too many for Logi-Po to water!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Different Folks - Monty and Gran disagree over ice cream flavours, leaving him unsure if people who like different things can still be friends.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: Bold Knight - When Stan is too scared to go into the cellar, Monty wonders if even adults get scared.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: Yes I Am, No You're Not - Charlie and Lola are looking forward to seeing a Chinese puppet show. But can they quit squabbling in time for the show?

programme.desc: Lost in Fog - It's very foggy in the Camping Park, the girls use sound to find their way around.

programme.desc: Rainbows - Nelly and Nora make rainbows for everyone.

programme.desc: Picture Planes - When Sarah and Duck are racing paper planes, they chance upon an exciting discovery.
