programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point S13 Ep36
programme.desc: Good Game Spawn Point is Australia's only videogame show for younger gamers. Gem, Rad, and Jax review the hottest new games, answer your toughest gaming questions, and celebrate all the fun news from the world of gaming.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep212
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Michael Rowland and Madeleine Morris bring you the latest news and interviews, Tony Armstrong with sport, and Nate Byrne with your weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep207
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien guides you through the morning with a mix of the latest news, live crosses to ABC reporters on the scene, media conferences and expert guests. Plus sports headlines with Tony Armstrong and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep207
programme.desc: Watch what happens as the day unfolds. Ros Childs brings you the top stories, breaking news, original reporting plus the latest details and special guests to keep you informed and up to date on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Play School - Up, Up And Away: 3 Ep18
programme.desc: Emma and Nicholas make springy creatures for their Bump-A-Deedle garden, wake up a very sleepy Humpty, play a sky-high dress up game and create a garden laboratory. Through the windows we find some butterflies.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point S13 Ep36
programme.desc: Good Game Spawn Point is Australia's only videogame show for younger gamers. Gem, Rad, and Jax review the hottest new games, answer your toughest gaming questions, and celebrate all the fun news from the world of gaming.

programme.title: Belonging(s) - Community: From Chinese Stores To Footy Teams S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Chinese stores in the 19th century to Aussie rules field back in the 1930s, we explore how Chinese Australians searched for a sense of belonging and community in Australia.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors - PNG's Winning Women S2 Ep6
programme.desc: As PNG's women's team prepares for the Rugby League World Cup, we meet the female pioneers and players who are inspiring women and girls to participate in the country's most loved game.

programme.title: Home And Away S33 Ep184
programme.desc: Ryder and Cash are trying to enlist people for different agendas. Tane starts the painful process of healing. Kieran's absence leaves a void. Justin receives bad news about the Garage.

programme.title: Back Roads - Tumut, NSW S8 Ep12
programme.desc: The Snowy Valleys come alive to the sound of music and traditions, old and new, bring a community together and heal the wounds of the past.

programme.title: Adam And Poh's Malaysia In Australia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Adam and Poh are on Bruny Island with cheesemaker and brewer Nick Haddow. Then Adam heads to Mudgee to explore Australian native ingredients. Back in the kitchen, Adam and Poh make Chicken Satay with Nyonya Peanut Sauce.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Episode 28 Ep28
programme.desc: With an eye on the world this multiple award-winning show has been running since 1992, bringing you reports from around the globe, highlighting issues faced by different countries and looking at ways we can learn from them.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep192
programme.desc: Greg Jennett is joined in our Parliament House studio by key political powerbrokers, commentators and experts ahead of tonight's Budget speech by Treasurer Jim Chalmers, handing down the first Albanese government budget.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep207
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Drum Ep192
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors - Staying On-Air S2 Ep7
programme.desc: We meet the head of Tonga's national broadcaster and learn how she and her team kept life-saving information going out on the airwaves as Tonga faced a devastating triple disaster.

programme.title: Home And Away S33 Ep184
programme.desc: Ryder and Cash are trying to enlist people for different agendas. Tane starts the painful process of healing. Kieran's absence leaves a void. Justin receives bad news about the Garage.

programme.title: Budget 2022/23: The Treasurer's Speech - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Five months after the Albanese government was elected, Treasurer Jim Chalmers hands down his first Federal Budget, Labor's first in almost a decade, outlining their economic plan for the future.

programme.title: Budget 2022/23: ABC News Special - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson and David Speers are joined by Andrew Probyn, Laura Tingle, Stan Grant and Jeremy Fernandez for the most extensive coverage, analysis and reaction to the first Budget by the Albanese government.

programme.title: Budget 2022/23: ABC News Special - Reaction and Analysis Ep2
programme.desc: The ABC's political team of David Speers, Andrew Probyn and Laura Tingle break down Treasurer Jim Chalmers' inaugural Budget, with reaction and analysis from experts and guests to examine how it will affect you.

programme.title: The Business - Budget Special Ep154
programme.desc: In a half hour Budget Night special, Kathryn Robinson and The Business team run the ruler over the Albanese government's first budget, speaking with economists and analysts to find out how it will affect you and the economy.

programme.title: The World Ep212

programme.title: Four Corners Ep36
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: With a razor-thin majority, can the Democrats avoid a midterm wipe-out? And will Donald Trump help or hinder a Republican 'red wave'? Chas and John are here to examine just how united the states of America really are.

programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories. Michael Tetlow brings you the latest news plus comprehensive coverage of the Federal Budget and what it means for you.

programme.title: LIVE: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Episode903HispaniceHeritageMonthPt1
programme.desc: Heritage Month Pt 1 - UFC Ultimate Knockouts returns with part one of our Hispanic Heritage Month celebration. See incredible KOs from Yair Rodriguez, Cub Swanson, Marlon “Chito” Vera, and more.

programme.title: UFC 280: Oliveira vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Abu Dhabi on October 22 with a UFC 280 card headlined by a clash for the vacant lightweight championship between Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. The former UFC lightweight champion, Brazil’s Oliveira is on a remarkable 11-fight winning streak in one of the sport’s toughest divisions, and after a quartet of victories over Tony Ferguson, Michael Chandler, Dustin Poirier, and Justin Gaethje, he established himself as the top 155-pounder in the world. Now he gets a chance to regain the crown when he faces the surging Makhachev, who has won 10 straight over the likes of Bobby Green, Dan Hooker and Thiago Moises. Plus, the bantamweight division takes center stage, as Aljamain Sterling defends his crown against TJ Dillashaw, and “Sugar” Sean O’Malley steps up for a huge showdown against Petr Yan.

programme.title: UFC 280: Oliveira vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC returns to Abu Dhabi on October 22 with a UFC 280 card headlined by a clash for the vacant lightweight championship between Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. The former UFC lightweight champion, Brazil’s Oliveira is on a remarkable 11-fight winning streak in one of the sport’s toughest divisions, and after a quartet of victories over Tony Ferguson, Michael Chandler, Dustin Poirier, and Justin Gaethje, he established himself as the top 155-pounder in the world. Now he gets a chance to regain the crown when he faces the surging Makhachev, who has won 10 straight over the likes of Bobby Green, Dan Hooker and Thiago Moises. Plus, the bantamweight division takes center stage, as Aljamain Sterling defends his crown against TJ Dillashaw, and “Sugar” Sean O’Malley steps up for a huge showdown against Petr Yan.

Now he gets a chance to regain the crown when he faces the surging Makhachev, who has won 10 straight over the likes of Bobby Green, Dan Hooker and Thiago Moises. Plus, the bantamweight division takes center stage, as Aljamain Sterling defends his crown against TJ Dillashaw, and “Sugar” Sean O’Malley steps up for a huge showdown against Petr Yan.

programme.title: UFC 280: Oliveira vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC returns to Abu Dhabi on October 22 with a UFC 280 card headlined by a clash for the vacant lightweight championship between Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Now he gets a chance to regain the crown when he faces the surging Makhachev, who has won 10 straight over the likes of Bobby Green, Dan Hooker and Thiago Moises. Plus, the bantamweight division takes center stage, as Aljamain Sterling defends his crown against TJ Dillashaw, and “Sugar” Sean O’Malley steps up for a huge showdown against Petr Yan.
